author: dicka
msg: Add in support of remaining XSD datatypes for serialization within engine.

Included with this piece of work, I have modified the engine such that serialization of each data element is carried out at the earliest oppurtunity (rather than the existing "last minute" serialization).
In addition I have taken the oppurtunity to tidy up redundant code in this area.
All changes have been fully tested on AIX, Linux and Windows.

author: samisa
msg: Removed the connection opening from Transport::flushOutput and moved it to ClientAxisEngine::invoke()

author: samisa
msg: Added connection opening logic to openConnection method and removed that from flushOutput and made flushOutput call openConnection

msg: Removed from CVS as this is outdated
